actions.committee: House Committee on Public Works and Transportation
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Public Works and Transportation.

official_title: A bill to authorize hydrographic surveys of the Columbia River from Richland, Wash., to Grand Coulee Dam.

summary.text: Directs the Secretary of the Army, acting through the Chief of Engineers, to conduct hydrographic surveys of the Columbia River in Washington, for the purpose of identifying navigational hazards, at an estimated cost of $500,000.

titles.title: A bill to authorize hydrographic surveys of the Columbia River from Richland, Wash., to Grand Coulee Dam.
